verses.verse: If a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H1589>steal<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%>, or a <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, and <S%H2873>kill<s%> <S%H4376>it<s%>, or sell <S%H7999>it<s%>; he shall pay <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> for an <S%H7794>ox<s%>, and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for a <S%H7716>sheep<s%>.
If the <S%H1590>thief<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> breaking <S%H4290>in<s%>, and be <S%H5221>smitten<s%> so that he <S%H4191>dieth<s%>, there shall be no bloodguiltiness for <S%H1818>him<s%>.

If the <S%H8121>sun<s%> be <S%H2224>risen<s%> upon <S%H1818>him<s%>, there shall be bloodguiltiness for <S%H7999>him<s%>; he shall make <S%H7999>restitution<s%>: if he have <S%H4376>nothing<s%>, then he shall be sold for his <S%H1591>theft<s%>.

If the <S%H1591>theft<s%> <S%H4672>be<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%>, whether it be <S%H7794>ox<s%>, or <S%H2543>ass<s%>, or <S%H7716>sheep<s%>; he shall <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H8147>double<s%>.

If a <S%H376>man<s%> shall cause a <S%H7704>field<s%> or <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> to be <S%H1197>eaten<s%>, and shall <S%H7971>let<s%> his <S%H1165>beast<s%> <S%H1197>loose<s%>, and it feed in another <S%H312>man<s%>'s <S%H7704>field<s%>; of the <S%H4315>best<s%> of his own <S%H7704>field<s%>, and of the <S%H4315>best<s%> of his own <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, shall he make <S%H7999>restitution<s%>.

If <S%H784>fire<s%> break <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H4672>catch<s%> in <S%H6975>thorns<s%>, so that the shocks of <S%H1430>grain<s%>, or the standing <S%H1430>grain<s%>, or the <S%H7704>field<s%> are <S%H398>consumed<s%>; he that <S%H1197>kindled<s%> the <S%H1200>fire<s%> shall <S%H7999>surely<s%> make <S%H7999>restitution<s%>.

If a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> unto his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> or <S%H3627>stuff<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%>, and it be <S%H1589>stolen<s%> out of the <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>; if the <S%H1590>thief<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%>, he shall <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H8147>double<s%>.

If the <S%H1590>thief<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%>, then the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall come <S%H7126>near<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, to see whether he have not <S%H7971>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H4399>goods<s%>.

For every <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6588>trespass<s%>, whether it be for <S%H7794>ox<s%>, for <S%H2543>ass<s%>, for <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, for <S%H8008>raiment<s%>, or for any manner of lost <S%H9>thing<s%>, whereof one <S%H559>saith<s%>, This is <S%H1697>it<s%>, the cause of both <S%H8147>parties<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> before <S%H430>God<s%>; he whom <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H7561>condemn<s%> shall <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H8147>double<s%> unto his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>.

If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> unto his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> an <S%H2543>ass<s%>, or an <S%H7794>ox<s%>, or a <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, or any <S%H929>beast<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%>; and it <S%H4191>die<s%>, or be <S%H7665>hurt<s%>, or driven <S%H7617>away<s%>, no man seeing <S%H7200>it<s%>:

the <S%H7621>oath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be between them <S%H8147>both<s%>, whether he hath not <S%H7971>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H4399>goods<s%>; and the <S%H1167>owner<s%> thereof shall <S%H3947>accept<s%> <S%H7999>it<s%>, and he shall not make restitution.
But if it be <S%H1589>stolen<s%> from <S%H7999>him<s%>, he shall make restitution unto the owner <S%H1167>thereof<s%>.
If it be torn in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>, let him <S%H935>bring<s%> it for <S%H5707>witness<s%>; he shall not make <S%H7999>good<s%> that which was <S%H2966>torn<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>borrow<s%> aught of his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, and it be <S%H7665>hurt<s%>, or <S%H4191>die<s%>, the <S%H1167>owner<s%> thereof not being with <S%H5973>it<s%>, he shall <S%H7999>surely<s%> make <S%H7999>restitution<s%>.
If the <S%H1167>owner<s%> thereof be with <S%H7999>it<s%>, he shall not make it good: if it be a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H935>thing<s%>, it came for its <S%H7939>hire<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6601>entice<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> that is not <S%H781>betrothed<s%>, and <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H4117>her<s%>, he shall surely <S%H4117>pay<s%> a dowry for her to be his <S%H802>wife<s%>.

If her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3985>utterly<s%> <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> her unto <S%H8254>him<s%>, he shall pay <S%H3701>money<s%> according to the <S%H4119>dowry<s%> of <S%H1330>virgins<s%>.
Thou shalt not suffer a <S%H3784>sorceress<s%> to <S%H2421>live<s%>.
Whosoever <S%H7901>lieth<s%> with a <S%H929>beast<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
He that <S%H2076>sacrificeth<s%> unto any <S%H430>god<s%>, <S%H1115>save<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2763>only<s%>, shall be utterly destroyed.
And a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> shalt thou not <S%H3238>wrong<s%>, neither shalt thou <S%H3905>oppress<s%> <S%H1616>him<s%>: for ye were sojourners in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
Ye shall not <S%H6031>afflict<s%> any <S%H490>widow<s%>, or fatherless <S%H3490>child<s%>.
If <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them at <S%H6817>all<s%>, and they <S%H6817>cry<s%> at <S%H6817>all<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, I will surely <S%H8085>hear<s%> their <S%H6818>cry<s%>;

and my <S%H639>wrath<s%> shall wax <S%H2734>hot<s%>, and I will <S%H2026>kill<s%> you with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and your <S%H802>wives<s%> shall be <S%H490>widows<s%>, and your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>.

If thou <S%H3867>lend<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to any of my <S%H5971>people<s%> with thee that is <S%H6041>poor<s%>, thou shalt not be to him as a <S%H5383>creditor<s%>; neither shall ye <S%H7760>lay<s%> upon him <S%H5392>interest<s%>.

If thou at <S%H2254>all<s%> <S%H2254>take<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H8008>garment<s%> to <S%H2254>pledge<s%>, thou shalt <S%H7725>restore<s%> it unto him <S%H5704>before<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goeth <S%H935>down<s%>:

for that is his only <S%H3682>covering<s%>, it is his <S%H8071>garment<s%> for his <S%H5785>skin<s%>: wherein shall he <S%H7901>sleep<s%>? and it shall come to <S%H6817>pass<s%>, when he crieth unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, that I will hear; for I am <S%H2587>gracious<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H7043>revile<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, nor <S%H779>curse<s%> a <S%H5387>ruler<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H309>delay<s%> to offer of thy <S%H4395>harvest<s%>, and of the <S%H1831>outflow<s%> of thy <S%H1060>presses<s%>. The first-born of thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> shalt thou give unto <S%H5414>me<s%>.

Likewise <S%H3651><s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> with thine <S%H7794>oxen<s%>, and with thy <S%H6629>sheep<s%>: <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> it shall be with its <S%H517>dam<s%>; on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt give it <S%H5414>me<s%>.

And ye shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> unto <S%H398>me<s%>: therefore ye shall not eat any <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is torn of <S%H2966>beasts<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>; ye shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> it to the <S%H3611>dogs<s%>.
